mapper.select: select u.name as creator,r.create_date,r.browsed_times,r.collected_times from resource r left join user u on r.creator=u.id where r.id=#{id}

select count(r.id) from collection c,resource r where c.rid=r.id and c.del=0 and c.creator=#{creator} and r.type = #{type}
and r.keyword like '%${keyword}%'

select r.type, count(r.id) from collection where c.del=0
and r.keyword like '%${keyword}%'
and c.creator=#{creator} and r.type in
#{type}
group by r.type

select r.type, count(r.id) from browse_history b left out join resource r on b.rid = r.id where c.del=0
and r.keyword like '%${keyword}%'
and b.creator=#{creator} and r.type in
#{type}
group by r.type

select r.type, count(r.id) from collection c left out join resource r on b.rid = r.id where c.del=0
and r.keyword like '%${keyword}%'
and c.creator=#{creator} and r.type in
#{type}
group by r.type
mapper.update: update resource set browsed_times=browsed_times+1 where id=#{id}
update resource set collected_times=collected_times+1 where id=#{id}
update resource set collected_times=collected_times-1 where id=#{id}
